record.dc:title: 299BN74 Cherry, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 84BN21 and 84BN22 (Dog). Burial 21, adult male on subsoil, head south, on left side, fully flexed. Burial 22, adult dog, head SE, on left side, flexed. Stratum I, bottom. Square 20R11. Direction North.
record.wpa:narrative: [84BN21] Adult male in good condition and complete. Fully flexed, flesh burial on left side, right arm over chest, left below left leg, head oriented to south. Excellent burial, lies on subsoil, no pottery - simple staining. Note hole in frontal - trephining? [84BN22] Indeterminate adult dog in fair condition and fairly complete. Partly flexed, flesh burial on left side, legs folded, head to SE. Dog in and covered with Subsoil. Yellow clay - almost no staining.
